sentences.english: Others were reported in the south of Western Sahara.
sentences.chinese: 另外，西撒哈拉沙漠南部也有蝗灾的报告。

sentences.english: Two areas have been struck by the locust plague at once.
sentences.chinese: 同时有两个地区遭到蝗灾。

sentences.english: The plague of locusts has been described as the worst in more than a decade.
sentences.chinese: 眼下的蝗灾被认为是过去的十多年中最为严重的一次。

sentences.english: One of the local officials joked to me that he was just waiting for a plague of locusts.
sentences.chinese: 当地有一名官员和我开玩笑说，现在就等着闹蝗灾了。

sentences.english: Who knows what sort of seventeen-year locust will next come out of the ground?
sentences.chinese: 谁知道下一次还会发生什么样的十七年蝗灾？

sentences.english: Scarlett thought despairingly that a plague of locusts would be more welcome.
sentences.chinese: 思嘉绝望地觉得这比经受一次蝗灾还要可怕。

sentences.english: In severe infestations webbing is present.
sentences.chinese: 在织带存在严重的蝗灾。

sentences.english: Locust plague is the serious problem in Shandong Province, the occurring area are large.
sentences.chinese: 山东省是东亚飞蝗蝗灾重发区，蝗区面积大。

sentences.english: The harvests in the Sahel region of West Africa have been severely damaged.
sentences.chinese: 蝗灾使西非撒黑尔地区的收成遭受了严重的打击。

definition: insect damage/destruction of crops by pest insects
